trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Austintown
There were no other sightings in Austintown on or around June 22nd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter and I were sitting out in backyard and I am always watching the sky. I was actually trying to get a look at the supermoon when all of a sudden the bright moving light appeared. I said what the hell is that? She looked and saw it to as the other 3 lights followed. Thought it was a shooting star at first but no it wasn't. They appeared all 4 moving together somewhat a distance between them. We watched as they dissappeared over the tree line and continued to sit and watch for their return. Tried to get a picture the only pic i caught looks like a huge orb. It was pretty cool though. Wish I would of had my good camera out but only had my cell.I was so in shock of what I saw I was fumbling with my phone and then they were gone. They appeared slow moving.
